text: Leslie Pressnell (11 November 1922 – 6 September 2011) was a British monetary historian. He taught at the University of Exeter, University College London, his alma mater the London School of Economics, City, University of London, and finally the University of Kent, where he was Professor of Economic and Social History. He authored several books. ==Selected works== * * ==Further reading== * ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Alumni of the London School of Economics Category:Academics of the University of Exeter Category:Academics of the London School of Economics Category:Academics of City, University of London Category:Academics of the University of Kent Category:British historians
title: Leslie Pressnell
